Paste API keys for Watson Tone Analyzer
info:
1. Log into IBM Cloud
2. Create an instance of the 
Watson Tone Analyzer service.
3. Visit the Service Credentials tab
4. Click on View Credentials
5. Copy/Paste the password and username into
this Node-RED node.

Or
1. Open this Cloud Foundry Node-RED Starter App
2. Create a new Connection
3. Bind the Watson Tone Analyzer service
4. Restage your Cloud Foundry application

name: High Score
Remove URLS and replace #
node-red-node-watson dependency
info:
This flow requires the
  node-red-node-watson@0.5.10 or higher
for the following Watson nodes:
  Text to Speech
  Speech to Text
  Tone Analyzer
  Visual Recognition

You can either 
  $ sudo npm -g install node-red-node-watson
  and restart the Node-RED service
or install it from Node-RED Manage Palette.

name: node-red-contrib-play-audio dependency
info:
This flow requires the
  node-red-contrib-play-audio
for the Browser play audio node.
You can either 
  $ sudo npm -g install node-red-contrib-play-audio
  and restart the Node-RED service
or install it from Node-RED Manage Palette.

name: Paste API keys for Watson Text to Speech
info:
1. Log into IBM Cloud
2. Create an instance of the 
Watson Text to Speech service.
3. Visit the Service Credentials tab
4. Click on View Credentials
5. Copy/Paste the password and username into
this Node-RED node.

Or
1. Open this Cloud Foundry Node-RED Starter App
2. Create a new Connection
3. Bind the Watson Text to Speech service
4. Restage your Cloud Foundry application
